.. description: 
.. tags: 
.. date: 2017/04/20 18:00:00
.. title: Poetry Voice
.. slug: index

<a href="http://bit.ly/poetryvoice"><img data-u="image" src="/img/litgallery/poetryvoice-dayofthedead-opt.png" title="Talk slantly to me" style="width: 60%;"/></a>

<p style="width: 60%;">Poetry Voice podcast takes the art of lovely words into the plentiful Colorado sunshine, keeping it lit. Much banter, decanters of laughter, featuring bards, and poetics they've mastered, with fresh interviews; all the news that stays news. From Colorado's Western slope and beyond.</p>
